title: 1912 T207 Fournier BROADLEAF back SGC 50 SOLD
author: tbob

posts.post_title: 1912 T207 Fournier BROADLEAF back SGC 50 SOLD
posts.post_content:
One of the tough "scarce back" cards in the set. Fournier was not offered with the "common" Recruit backs and is very scarce. Original and authentic card graded SGC 50. Beautiful card, only a little corner wear upper right keeps it from being graded even higher. No creases or paper missing. Trying a new scanner so please bear with me :o
First email or post wins the card $275.00 which includes shipping and insurance. Thanks. SOLD!
[url]trophybob@sbcglobal.net[/url]
Bob
I'll take it if it's still available.  Thanks!
